com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs

Class HcsDidPlainMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.HcsDidPlainMessage

  • public class HcsDidPlainMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    The DID document message in a plain (unencrypted) form.

        Creates a new instance of HcsDidPlainMessage.
        Parameters:
        didOperation - The operation on DID document.
        did - The DID string.
        didDocumentBase64 - The Base64-encoded DID document.
        signature - The signature.
        consensusTimestamp - Consensus timestamp of the DID message.

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.consensus.ConsensusTopicId didTopicId)
        Validates this DID message by checking its completeness, signature and DID document.
        Parameters:
        didTopicId - The DID topic ID against which the message is validated.
        Returns:
        True if the message is valid, false otherwise.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Validates this DID message by checking its completeness, signature and DID document without matching topic ID.
        Returns:
        True if the message is valid, false otherwise.

      • getDidDocument

        public java.lang.String getDidDocument()
        Decodes didDocumentBase64 field and returns its content. In case this message is in encrypted mode, it will return encrypted content, so getPlainDidDocument method should be used instead.
        Returns:
        The decoded DID document as JSON string.
